docs.title: DocsOps Quality Gate
docs.text:
This is a tiny MkDocs site so you can publish the repo as a docs-as-code project.

Open a PR that changes docs and watch the DocsOps Quality Gate workflow produce a scorecard.

docs.title: Example doc
docs.text:
We prefer allowlist over whitelist, and blocklist over blacklist.

A link that should work: https://example.com

A broken link (intentionally): https://example.com/this-page-does-not-exist-hopefully

Broken link: https://example.com/this-will-404
